name: PooSky
description:
You live in a a cloudless country on the clouds. But they came, and you run.. You have no choice. And you can not win. You can only run for fun these assfaces. How long do you hold out with this idea? What will be your last race?

You have to live as long as possible on the planet, as you call your home. Run, run, do not stop!

What is in the game:
- Peculiar protagonist, who expresses the identity of a community;
- A unique antagonist that you will remember for a long time;
- Rhythmic soundtrack;
- Deep sense.
